infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to track delivery routes and provide real-time driver location updates to dispatch.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs continuous location access to track delivery routes, provide real-time driver location updates, and enable background location tracking for active delivery jobs.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs continuous location access to track delivery routes and provide real-time driver location updates even when the app is in the background during active delivery jobs.
